title: Day 10 - Learned about Blender, Chess and Cryptocurrency
content:
• After making some animations, I wanted to learn about modeling. So, today I started a course on Blender modeling. Today I learned about some basic shapes and views in Blender and made a 3-D model using basic shapes. It was easy to make as I have basic information from making animations.
  • Today I solved some puzzles in chess. They are good for observing tactics in a position. I scored 10 points in puzzle rush which is a decent start.
  • I started watching Cryptocurrency Investing Masterclass by Ankur Warikoo with Nischal Shetty who is the founder of WazirX on Youtube. The first episode educated me about what is the concept of money, what is the need for decentralization, and why we need cryptocurrencies.
author: Aarush Popli
